s: May 6, 2024 - Amazon’s logo is scalable and retains its impact in different sizes. Design your logo to be scalable for various applications. A boutique could design a logo that looks good on everything from store signage to small product tags. Color matters. Amazon uses black and orange, which are energetic and bold.
